entry.title: Pan-PMC Meeting - October 15, 2019
entry.summary:
FINOS' next Open Source in Fintech Event Series Meetup is Tuesday, March 5th at Moody's. The theme of the evening will be FINOS' newly launched Decentralized Ecosytem Growth program for which I serve as Program Management Committee Lead.
